item.title: Happy Programmer's Day 2020
item.description: I love programming. A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away … Iâ€™ve got a Nintendo NES. It was nice to play Super Mario, Mega Man, and other classic games, but the games were rather expensive. So I convinced my parents to buy an even more expensive personal computer (PC). Games for the PC were also expensive, so I looked into other stuff I can do with a PC.
